topic.title: POSTCODE OF DISCHARGE DESTINATION (HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL)
topic.shortdesc: POSTCODE OF DISCHARGE DESTINATION (HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL) is the POSTCODE of the ADDRESS of the PATIENT's destination on completion of a Hospital Provider Spell.
